getAdaptor

public static Adaptor getAdaptor(java.lang.String speciesAlias,
                                 java.lang.String group,
                                 java.lang.String type)
Gets the adaptor.

This method must first check if the adaptor you're looking for is a dna-fetching one (Sequence, AssemblyMapper, KaryotypeBand, RepeatFeature, CoordSystem, AssemblyExceptionFeature)

If so, then it will use a dnaspecies and dnagroup to retrieve the adaptor requested.

Otherwise, it will just return the adaptor of the type requested from the species/group.

--if that adaptor doesn't exist, it will create it first, cache it and then return it.
